daily_fact: Stay engaged with your community through local news and civic participation.
topline_md: A winter storm is set to impact NYC and the Tri-State area with snow and rain, complicating holiday travel, while recent incidents of violence and accidents, including a car crash in Queens and subway slashings, raise safety concerns in the city.

risks_alerts.title: Risks & Alerts
risks_alerts.summary_md:
